data.actual_result: The text in the box remains on the client after sending the message through the overlay, or vice versa.
data.expected_result: Either the unsent message isn't synced in the fisrt place, or the text in the box is removed after sending.
data.short_description: Sending a message isn't synced to overlay.
data.steps_to_repro: - Type something in a message field on the client. - Reload  the client. - In your overlay, go to the channel you typed in, and noticed what you've typed is in the box. - Send the message. - Observe your client.
